data.text: @PIB_India @MoHFW_INDIA @MIB_India @COVIDNewsByMIB @DDNewslive @airnewsalerts I'm praying god always in next life to birth as an family member of prime minister Narendra Modiji and home minister Amit Shahji, I'm loving and living for them 24 hours, they always super,great, success,inspirational,motivational and one of the best human being in the world.
